CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 10, 1956, pg. A32, reads: "Platters Visit Walt - When the Platters were at the Copa, Downtown Pittsburgh, last week, they took time out to visit Walt Harper, the Pittsburgh bandleader, and helped him celebrate his first anniversary on Station WHOD. The Platters presented their latest recording, 'Magic Touch,' to Walt, who has the biggest jazz show in Pittsburgh. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: The Platters, possibly including Zola Taylor, Herb Reed, Tony Williams, David Lynch, and Paul Robi, gathered around DJ Walt Harper, in WHOD radio station studio
